title: JapaneZ
description:
Facilitates the learning of the three Japanese alphabets. This app allows users to practice their writing, listening, and test their knowledge.
Technologies used: React, Redux, MUI, AWS S3

title: Bookie
description:

title: SuiteLife Django
description:

title: C# Employee project
description:

title: JournalMe
description:
Organizational web app where a user can log in to view notes, reminders, and set personal goals. It was inspired by bullet journaling tiktoks! 
Technologies used: React, Redux, MUI, MongoDB
